# 素材 2

DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS scott;
CREATE DATABASE scott
    DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4   -- 乱码问题
    DEFAULT COLLATE utf8mb4_bin     -- 英文大小写不敏感问题
;
USE scott;
1
2
3
4
5
6
set foreign_key_checks = off;

################
# Create Table #
###############
CREATE TABLE customer
(
    id           int AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '客户ID',
    cust_name    char(50) COMMENT '客户名称',
    cust_address char(50) COMMENT '地址',
    cust_city    char(50) COMMENT '市',
    cust_state   char(5) COMMENT '州/省',
    cust_zip     char(10) COMMENT '邮编',
    cust_country char(50) COMMENT '国家',
    cust_contact char(50) COMMENT '联系方式',
    cust_email   char(255) COMMENT '邮箱',
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
) ENGINE = InnoDB
    COMMENT '客户信息表';

CREATE TABLE orderitem
(
    id         int AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键ID',
    order_id   int COMMENT '订单编号',
    order_item int COMMENT '顺序号',
    prod_id    char(10) COMMENT '商品id',
    quantity   int COMMENT '数量',
    item_price decimal(8, 2) COMMENT '单品价格',
    PRIMARY KEY (id),
    UNIQUE (order_id, order_item)
) ENGINE = InnoDB
    COMMENT '客户信息表';

CREATE TABLE `order`
(
    id         int AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '订单ID',
    order_date datetime COMMENT '下单日期',
    cust_id    int COMMENT '购买客户ID',
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
) ENGINE = InnoDB
    COMMENT '订单表';

CREATE TABLE product
(
    id         char(10) COMMENT '主键ID',
    prod_name  char(255) COMMENT '商品名称',
    prod_price decimal(8, 2) COMMENT '商品价格',
    prod_desc  text COMMENT '商品描述',
    vend_id    int COMMENT '供应商ID',
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
) ENGINE = InnoDB
    COMMENT '商品表';

CREATE TABLE vendor
(
    id           int AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键ID',
    vend_name    char(50) COMMENT '供应商名称',
    vend_address char(50) COMMENT '地址',
    vend_city    char(50) COMMENT '市',
    vend_state   char(5) COMMENT '州',
    vend_country char(50) COMMENT '国家',
    vend_zip     char(10) COMMENT '邮编',
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
) ENGINE = InnoDB
    COMMENT '供应商表';

CREATE TABLE productnote
(
    id        int AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键ID',
    note_date datetime COMMENT '发布日期',
    note_text text COMMENT '商品详情内容',
    prod_id   char(10) COMMENT '商品ID',
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
) ENGINE = InnoDB
    COMMENT '商品描述表';

######################
# Define Foreign Key #
######################
# ALTER TABLE orderitem DROP FOREIGN KEY fk_orderitem_order_id;
# ALTER TABLE orderitem ADD CONSTRAINT fk_orderitem_order_id FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES `order`(id);

# ALTER TABLE orderitem DROP FOREIGN KEY fk_orderitem_prod_id;
# ALTER TABLE orderitem ADD CONSTRAINT fk_orderitem_prod_id FOREIGN KEY (prod_id) REFERENCES product(id);

# ALTER TABLE order DROP FOREIGN KEY fk_order_cust_id;
# ALTER TABLE `order` ADD CONSTRAINT fk_order_cust_id FOREIGN KEY (cust_id) REFERENCES customer (id);

# ALTER TABLE product DROP FOREIGN KEY fk_product_vend_id;
# ALTER TABLE product ADD CONSTRAINT fk_product_vend_id FOREIGN KEY (vend_id) REFERENCES vendor (id);

# ALTER TABLE productnote drop foreign key fk_productnote_prod_id;
# ALTER TABLE productnote ADD CONSTRAINT fk_productnote_prod_id FOREIGN KEY (prod_id) REFERENCES product(id);


###############
# Insert Data #
###############

VALUES (101, 'TNT2', '2005-08-17',

       (107, 'SAFE', '2005-08-23', 'Please note that no returns will be accepted if safe opened using explosives.'),
       (108, 'ANV01', '2005-08-25',

       (111, 'SLING', '2005-09-02', 'Shipped unassembled, requires common tools (including oversized hammer).'),

       (113, 'ANV01', '2005-09-05',

set foreign_key_checks = on;
